channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Public highway / parking bay blocked, 5th September
item.description:
Please can you advise if this private company have the authority to block access to the motorcycle bay (Ringo ref 54058)? It has consistently been happening and is causing congestion on the remaining motorcycle parking bays.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Finsbury Square, Finsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag (Estates)

item.title: Entrance floods and gets very muddy, 5th September
item.description:
This is the route used by dog walkers and parents walking their children to school from the local area. As soon as it rains, it floods and becomes extremely muddy. Prams are having to be pushed through this and children in school shoes have to walk through this every morning as do dogs and their owners. This has been an ongoing issue for many years now. Some sort of covering needs to be put over this area to stop this happening .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eden Park Avenue, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
